# 绘制基本折线图

运行 `ggplot()` 函数和 `geom_line()` 函数，并分别指定一个变量映射到 `x` 和 `y` 。





::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code  code-fold="false"}
# load package
library(ggplot2)
# load dataset
BOD
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
  Time demand
1    1    8.3
2    2   10.3
3    3   19.0
4    4   16.0
5    5   15.6
6    7   19.8
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code  code-fold="false"}
ggplot(BOD,aes(x = Time,y = demand))+
geom_line()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](04-ggplot2-folded-line_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
